text: The Entrance to Liaoning University of International Business and Economics Liaoning University of International Business and Economics () is a university located in Lushunkou District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province, the People's Republic of China. Address: No. 33, Shunle Street, Lushun Economic Development Zone, Dalian City, Liaoning Province 116052 Phone: 0411-8620-8758 ==See also== * Beijing University of International Business and Economics, Beijing ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site Category:Universities and colleges in Liaoning Category:Universities and colleges in Dalian
title: Liaoning University of International Business and Economics
